name: Expand the Taiyuan Railway
description: The existing railway system in Taiyuan is woefully outdated, we should refit it to modern standards.

name: Connect Yan'an
description: Yan'an, situated at the end of Shanxi, should be connected via railway and other means to industrial and governmental centres such as Taiyuan.

name: Connect the Villages
description: Shanxi is dotted by villages all over, they should be connected via modern infrastructure.

name: Mountain Railways
description: Being separated by mountains is no longer an insurmountable obstacle. Narrow gauge railways and other techniques can be employed to connect our settlements in mountainous regions.

name: Exploit the Western Mines
description: The mines in the west of Shanxi have blessed the province with great wealth. We need to be able to exploit this bounty for the good of Shanxi.

name: Expand the Coal Fields
description: We should expand our coal mining operations in order to truly harness their bountiful resources.

name: Industrial Development
description: We have yet to construct true heavy industry in Shanxi. We should invest the capital we have gained from our natural resources into manufacturing capacity so we may transition into a fully industrialised province.

name: Fund Factory Construction
description: We need to nurture our young corporations and small businesses, and provide incentives to invest in factory construction.

name: Urbanisation in Taiyuan
description: Taiyuan should be urbanised into a fully modernised city. Large buildings, factories, infrastructure, it will have everything.

name: Attract Foreign Investment
description: We should attract foreign investors to invest in our economy. After all, cooperation is better than exploitation.

name: Rural Economy
description: Shanxi needs to learn to rely on its rural areas. Let the economy be dominated by rural endeavours.

name: Farm Cooperation
description: While it is sometimes difficult to trust your fellow countrymen in such a tumultuous country as China, we cannot truly prosper unless we band together as a Chinese community. We should start cooperating with other regional powers in order to improve our agricultural potential.

name: Combat Soil Erosion
description: Shanxi has a very nasty case of soil erosion, which heavily hurts our crop yields. We must combat it in any way possible if we are to continue to prosper as a province.

name: Irrigation Projects
description: While we continue fighting to keep Shanxi prosperous, we shall start irrigation projects to help crop yields grow.

name: Promote Grain Production
description: The production of grain is essential for a functioning society, as grain is needed to make bread, a staple food. We should encourage grain production in our province.

name: Ban the Opium Trade
description: Opium, introduced by Western imperialists to subdue China, is an evil and dangerous substance that has poisoned China for decades. We must ban all Opium trade to curb opium addiction through the province.

name: Rural Investments
description: We should invest in more rural endeavours to better develop our agricultural sector and rural communities.

name: Industrial Innovation
description: Innovation is an important thing for an industrialising nation and we cannot dismiss that. We should look into innovative ways to maximise productivity.

name: Land Reform Programs
description: Land Reform is a universal issue in China and Shanxi is no exception. Land must be redistributed in a fair and equitable way to Shanxi's farmers.

name: Christian Statism
description: Feng Yuxiang, known as the "Christian General" for his attempts to spread Christianity, has seized control of Shanxi. He will start an initiative to make Shanxi the beacon of Christianity and nationalism in China.

name: Rural Literacy Programs
description: Helping those in need is a core tenant of Christianity. Shanxi should follow suit by starting rural literacy programs to educate the masses and create a more informed and loyal populous.

name: A Church of Our Own
description: Feng Yuxiang's Christian beliefs do not necessarily correlate with any established Church in Europe or America. As such, Feng decided to start his own Church, the Church of China. The Church of China will spread Christian values as well as love and admiration for China.

name: Sunday Schools
description: We should open Sunday Schools to teach Shanxi's children about Chinese Christian values to help them become committed citizens in the future.

name: Christian Corporations
description: Feng's western advisors have suggested the idea that our citizens should be organised into economic corporations based upon their profession. These corporations will make the economic body of Shanxi, allowing for the people to prosper and for Shanxi to grow.

name: Promote the Christian Ideal
description: The Christian ideal, with Chinese characteristics, should be the way of our future. Adherence to Christian values in addition to creating a spirit of Chinese nationalism should be championed by the Guominjun in Shanxi and in China.

name: Social Welfare
description: Christian nations in the west have spearheaded many welfare programs, in accordance with the teachings of Christ. We too must feed our hungry and care for our orphans and widows, and create a prosperous Shanxi and a prosperous China.

name: Christian Education
description: We should give the people of Shanxi proper Christian education. We must show them God's love, encourage them to be virtuous, and uphold Feng's righteous cause for the good of China.

name: A University in Taiyuan
description: Primary schools are a mandatory first step in our education programs. However, we also need to give the people of Shanxi access to higher education. Accordingly, we will build a proper university in Taiyuan.

name: Rebuild the Guominjun
description: While it is now in power, the Guominjun is, at its core, little more than a bunch of former bandits with a central command. We should reorganise the Guominjun into a proper army, one that is not to be trifled with.

name: The Christian Army
description: With its remarkable inclusion of Christian values in its ideology, the Guominjun, known as the "Christian Army", shall live up to its name. Our goal is to spread Christianity and Nationalist values all across China.

name: American Advisors
description: Using his connections with his missionary organisations, Feng has secured several American advisors to help build his new army. Though America has not fought a war since the Spanish-American war of 1898, they still have much-needed experience to share with us.

name: Army Chaplains
description: Feng has envisioned a corps of chaplains to be a part of his army to ensure that the morale in his ranks does not waver, and to remind his soldiers what they're fighting for.

name: Christian Soldiers
description: We should motivate our soldiers to commit themselves to Christ and to our cause of spreading Chinese Christianity and Chinese nationalism. Feng has even commissioned a battle hymn for soldiers to sing as they prepare to fight.

name: Feng's Crusade
description: Feng is an ambitious man, and many know that. He has plans to expand his reach to the rest of China in what some are calling "Feng Yuxiang's Crusade". We shall depose the false monarchs and tyrants, and free China once and for all!

name: Join the Fray
description: Though Feng is a God-fearing man, he also knows that the world is full of darkness terrors and one man standing alone is insufficient.

name: Increase Armament Production
description: We need to increase armament production to realise our goals and ambitions. It will be our highest priority.

name: New Rifles
description: We shall acquire new rifles to help us liberate China. Our army must not be forced to rely on obsolete equipment.

name: Mountain Warfare
description: Shanxi is a rather mountainous province and hence we must learn how to properly fight in such conditions. Experienced mountaineers can teach soldiers how to properly fight in the mountains.

name: Artillery Improvements
description: Artillery has won many battles in China. We should develop our own artillery to match the abilities of other warlords and those of the foreign imperialists.

name: A Refined Force
description: We should give our soldiers and officers specialised military education in order for them to hone their abilities and assist us in our wars of liberation.

name: Radio Communications
description: Shanxi is riddle with hills, mountains and other large natural obstacles making communication between units a tiresome task. With the use of wireless radios, this task will make it easier for our units to relay communication and be a god send for our runners.

name: Expand the Engineer Corps
description: Shanxi has been blessed with natural defences, allowing for our army to enjoy easily prepared defensive positions. The same can be said for our surrounding neighbours and expanding our Engineer Corp will allow us to deal with this.

name: Recon Unit Training
description: We should give the Guominjun reconnaissance training in order to hone its fighting ability in the future.

name: New Officer Standards
description: Officers promoted through nepotism are no longer acceptable options to lead an army as large as the Guominjun. We should promote a new standard for officers that everyone should follow.
